```{r packages, include=FALSE}
library(MASS)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r box_cox_moment_1}
model.1 <- lm(R_moment_1 ~ St + Re + Fr, data = train)

bc.1 <- boxcox(R_moment_1 ~ St + Re + Fr, data = train)
lambda.1 <- bc.1$x[which.max(bc.1$y)]
```
